column1: ConditionsAll existing traffic and parking controls and restrictionsshall apply without a Special Traffic Permit issued bySFMTA. Please check Blue Book for traffic restrictions.To obtain a Blue Book, contact SFMTA at 415-701-4673.A minimum of 4 feet of clearance should be availableat all times to allow for public path of travel.Pursuant to Article 29 of the San Francisco PoliceCode, a Night Noise Permit for operation in the PublicRight-of-Way shall be required for work that createsany noise 5dBA above the ambient noise level of thatarea at the nearest property plane.No noise permitted between the hours of 7:00PM and7:00AM.Event/Operation:Roving operation - fiber optic cable installationPermit Linear Footage580Elements of OccupancyLine truck roving from utility pole to utility pole placingstrand and fiber optic cable.  Roving work not toexceed approximately 30 minutes at each location.From:8/7/2017 07:00AMStart Time07:00AMTo:8/8/2017 05:00PMEnd Time05:00PMNeed to call for InspectionNeed to post tow-away signTo activate and register this permit for towing, followthe tow-away sign activation and photo uploadprocess.  To tow a vehicle call the Tow Desk at (415)553-1200.Special Traffic permit requiredNFood:NOther:Performing Arts:NStreet Space Hours07:00AM Thru 05:00PMMeter Segment(s)Night NoiseWork Scope
